articles.title: Supreme Court Appears Likely to Keep Trump on Colorado Primary Ballot
articles.description: During oral arguments, justices from both conservative and liberal wings expressed skepticism about Colorado's decision to disqualify Trump under the 14th Amendment's insurrection clause.

articles.title: King Charles diagnosed with cancer, begins treatment
articles.description: Buckingham Palace announced that King Charles III has been diagnosed with cancer discovered during his recent prostate treatment. The 75-year-old monarch has begun regular treatments and postponed public duties.

articles.title: Boeing replaces head of 737 Max program after mid-air incident
articles.description: Boeing removed Ed Clark, the head of its 737 Max program, following the Alaska Airlines door plug incident. The leadership change comes amid increased scrutiny of Boeing's quality control measures.
